description: The Law™ Jean is guilty as charged. Kuhl's set a new standard in durability and comfort with this ultra-tough cotton blend. With built-in stretch when you need it, these jeans deliver a casual style that will make them your everyday favorites. Kuhl's unique dying process develops a vintage, “lived-in” appearance as fading occurs.
name: Kuhl The Law Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens
